snippet.title: Frost Bite Trailer-long
snippet.description:
The wind howls and snow falls.  While exploring the mountains around your village you see strange lights in the sky and when heading back you realize you are being followed.  Set at night in snow covered mountains Frost Bite is a chilly indie horror game where even the footing is treacherous. 

This trailer features real time play through of a portion of the game with cinematic music for ambiance.  
You can get your copy at- https://gildedoctopusstudios.itch.io/frost-bite
